channel.title: CVE Feed for CryoutCreations -- Nirvana

item.title: CVE-2024-44057|2024-09-15T08:15:00.689Z -- cryoutcreations -- nirvana
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CryoutCreations Nirvana allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Nirvana: from n/a through 1.6.3.
